name: Heartist Campaign
text: Gain two political capital. All demographics shift towards the hearts extreme

name: Diamondism Campaign
text: Gain two political capital. All demographics shift towards the diamonds extreme

name: Clubimist Campaign
text: Gain two political capital. All demographics shift towards the clubs extreme

name: Pro-Spade Campaign
text: Gain two political capital. All demographics shift towards the spades extreme

name: Heartist Leadership
text: You shift towards the hearts extreme. Gain one popularity

name: Pro-Spade Leadership
text: You shift towards the spades extreme. Your opponent loses two popularity

name: Diamondism Leadership
text: You shift towards the diamonds extreme. Draw two cards

name: Clubimist Leadership
text: You shift towards the clubs extreme. Your opponent discards two random cards

name: Campaign Trail
text: Gain one popularity

name: Pander to Base
text: Your followers shift towards you, then shift away from your opponent, then your followers shift towards you again

name: Prioritize Public Appeal
text: Gain one popularity then your followers shift away from you twice

name: Regress to the Mean
text: Gain one popularity and shift towards the center

name: Two Party System
text: Your followers shift towards your opponent, then their followers shift towards you. Gain one popularity

name: Personality over Policy
text: Gain one popularity and gain one political capital, then shift towards your opponent

name: Criticize Rival
text: Shift away from your opponent, then your opponent loses one popularity

name: Reduce Harmful Rhetoric
text: Undecided voters shift towards the center. You gain one popularity

name: Open-minded Policy Making
text: Choose a player. That player draws 2 cards and loses 2 popularity

name: Cultural Progress
text: Choose an extreme. All demographics shift towards that extreme

name: New Leadership
text: Choose an extreme. Shift towards that extreme twice and gain one popularity

name: Targeted Advertising
text: Choose an extreme. All demographics in that quadrant shift towards you twice

name: Dog Whistle
text: Choose an extreme. Undecided voters in that quadrant and your followers in that quadrant shift towards you twice

name: Anti Establishment Rhetoric
text: Choose an extreme. Undecided voters shift towards that extreme twice

name: Heartist Policies
text: At the end of each round, if you are in the hearts extreme, all demographics in that quadrant shift towards you and you gain two popularity

name: Clubimist Policies
text: At the end of each round, if you are in the clubs extreme, all demographics in that quadrant shift towards you and you gain two popularity

name: Pro-Spade Policies
text: At the end of each round, if you are in the spades extreme, all demographics in that quadrant shift towards you and you gain two popularity

name: Diamondism Policies
text: At the end of each round, if you are in the diamonds extreme, all demographics in that quadrant shift towards you and you gain two popularity

name: Strategic Policies
text: At the end of each round, gain 2 political capital

name: Popular Policies
text: At the end of each round, gain 1 popularity
